entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pemberton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:28 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pemberton Airport 3:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy with risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 30 to 40 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of freezing rain mixed with rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
